alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:02PM CDT until July 05 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 302 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Amity, or 20 miles southeast of Mount Ida, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Amity... Meyers... Lofton... Rockwell... DeGray Lake State Park... Bismarck... Alpine... Bonnerdale... Sunshine... Welsh... Rosboro... Royal... Point Cedar... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... Crystal Springs... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
